input.sentences: the group of men arrived to inspect the power station .
they checked all of the instruments at the station .
after that they checked the towers and the power lines .
since a storm was coming in it was time to go .
output.sentences: They ensure all instruments at the station are checked thoroughly.
They inspected all back-up generators are in working order.
Towers and power lines are checked for any concerns.
The inspection is completed just in time for the storm to hit.
